name: Conn::ctor
description:
YOU CAN TURN THE FULLSCREEN ON :)

Objective:  Conn::ct the laser with the green block to win  Controls:

Mouse - Select an object (it will slightly lightup)

Arrows - Move selected object

Escape - Doubleclick to leave to menu

R - restart level

Objects:

Sender: Casts laser.

Receiver: Conn::ct the laser to it in order to win.

Glass: Laser goes trough.

Black Glass: Turned off or on by button.

Rotation block: Rotates any object that lands on it by 90 degress.

Box: It's a box.

Mirror: Reflects laser.

Pink Block: Don't conn::ct to it or you'll have to try again.
